mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAREER ( CAREER_ID , GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , PREVIOUS_COMPANY_NAME , JOB_TITLE , HIRE_DATE , RESIGN_DATE) VALUES ( 'CA-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_CAREER_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{generalMemberEmail} , #{previousCompanyName} , #{jobTitle} , #{hireDate} , #{resignDate})
mapper.select: SELECT CAREER_ID , GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , PREVIOUS_COMPANY_NAME , JOB_TITLE , TO_CHAR(HIRE_DATE,'yyyy-DD-mm') HIRE_DATE , TO_CHAR(RESIGN_DATE,'yyyy-DD-mm') RESIGN_DATE FROM CAREER WHERE CAREER_ID = #{_parameter}
